abstract: Celebrities gather for New york Academy of Art's annual Tribeca Ball.

headline.print_headline: Buying Art Off the Wall, at the Tribeca Ball
headline.main: Marina Abramovic, Swizz Beatz and Al Pacino at Tribeca Ball

snippet: Celebrities, would-be art collectors and artists at an annual gala to benefit the New York Academy of Art.
lead_paragraph: Celebrities, would-be art collectors and artists at an annual gala to benefit the New York Academy of Art.
